resources.string: For each question in this section, you will hear a complete paragraph on your screen. When you hear voices, you have to pick a word you hear. Then fill in the blanks. The statement will not be displayed on your test screen and will be spoken only once.

It can take a long time to become successful in your chosen field, however talented you are. One thing you have to be (1)____ aware of is that you will face criticism along the way. The world is (2)____ filled of people who would rather say something negative than positive. If you’ve made up your (3)_____ to achieve a certain goal, such as writing a novel, (4)_____ the negative criticism of others prevent you from reaching your target, and let the constructive criticism have a positive effect on your work. If someone says you’re totally in the (5)____ of talent, ignore them.
